text:
@realDonaldTrump Los Angeles March 29, 2008.

The Red Sox posted a 7-4 victory before an officially announced crowd of 115,300. This remains the only baseball game in which the 100,000 figure has been provably exceeded.

When will Trump break this number with US Covid19 deaths?!

Very soon!! 😢
